metadata.title: Identity & Access Admin SC-300 Practice Questions

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Implement Identities in Azure AD (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Administrative Units is a key concept in Implement Identities in Azure AD. This domain covers topics essential for the Identity & Access Admin exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with create, configure, and manage identities. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any implement identities in azure ad task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Implement Identities in Azure AD is most closely related to implement and manage external identities?
options: Implement Identities in Azure AD governance and oversight
Implement Identities in Azure AD implementation and operations
Implement Identities in Azure AD assessment and testing
Implement Identities in Azure AD risk management
questions.explanation: Implement and manage external identities falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Implement Identities in Azure AD.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Implement Identities in Azure AD (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: B2B Collaboration is a key concept in Implement Identities in Azure AD. This domain covers topics essential for the Identity & Access Admin exam.
